newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares seen maintaining flat trend.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares seen maintaining flat trend.

text.p: Polish shares were expected to maintain their recent flat trend as forthcoming large privatisations dampened buying of listed stocks amid an otherwise good market mood.
Analysts said firms' April earnings data, most due later on Monday, could move some stocks, and that banks should continue their recent subpar earnings performance.
Some analysts said speculation by domestic players on a possible U.S. interest-rate rise on Tuesday could cause falls. @
Food producer PEPEES, whose public offering of 152,100 shares at a minimum price of 100 zlotys took place last week, has its shares allotted at a special bourse session.
